post:
bodHOST provide affordable fully managed Windows VPS and dedicated server hosting services to host content management system Umbraco with 100% network uptime guarantee, 24x7 customer support, and an attractive discount offer. Enter Coupon code: bodHOSTVPS and you will receive 20% off for any following Windows VPS packages you purchase from us. For Windows dedicated server hosting enter coupon code: bodHOSTDedicated to get 20% Discount.

What is Umbraco?

Umbraco is a content management system and ideal platform for publishing content on the Internet. It is an open source CMS, meaning that it is available free to use. Its code is maintained and developed and users. Umbraco runs on Microsoft platforms as it is mainly written in C#.

Technical requirements:

To host Umbraco successfully, it is strongly recommended that you have SQL Server and ASP.NET. We will assist you in the installation process but for the website customization work you will have to contact a professional web developer.

You can remotely connect to your Umbraco database:

You will get a full remote connection to your SQL server to access Umbraco database. This means that you will have full management capabilities over your database and can directly access and manage database whenever you need, you just need to use powerful SQL Server Management tools such as SQL Management Studio.

You can also transfer your existing Umbraco website to bodHOST:

You can easily transfer your existing website on our servers. You don’t need to rebuild the database from scratch. If you already have an Umbraco database hosted elsewhere, then all you need to do is just take a backup of your database which can be easily restored to the bodHOST’s server hosting package for Umbraco.
